I have encountered some fine minds in this section. In fact, I am impressed with the minds in here. I am trying to eliminate some deficiencies in my understanding of economics and I have started a thread under economics entitled "What Creates Wealth, Capital?" An understanding of the theories of Adam Smith would be very much appreciated. Also, it will distract me from running speculation about physics into the ground with the hairy brane nonsense.
